</title>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 38

**Price** 40,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Shield** [Steel Shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=3)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This [steel shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=3) (Hardness 16, HP 96, BT 48) is painted a mottled crimson, and it always glistens as if wet. Its crest is composed of eight appendages that curl around each other, resembling the swirling tentacles of a giant [kraken](/Monsters.aspx?ID=275). Two ferocious eyes sit in its center, gleaming with an inner light.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> Raise a Shield;  **Frequency** once per hour;   **Effect** You unleash the kraken's wrath. You Raise the Shield. The shield's appendages briefly extend to impossible length as they wriggle and lash out at your foes, dealing 10d10 bludgeoning damage to all enemies in a 30-foot cone (DC 41 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). The shield remains animated for 1 minute, during which you can use it to [Grapple](/Actions.aspx?ID=35) a creature within 10 feet of you without needing a free hand. When you use the shield to Grapple, you gain a +3 item bonus to your [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
